```{r}
addressesCust <- read.csv("addressesCust.csv")

View(addressesCust)

b <- addressesCust %>% 
  subset(Addr1 == "30500 WATTS VALLEY RD") %>% 
  subset(Treat == "Min") %>% 
  select(HVRA)
str(b)
View(b)

b <- b[1,]

b <- as.vector(b)

a <- 10

ab <- a*b
str(ab)
View(ab)
```
